reviewText: I purchases this movie because I have others from the same director and they are generally outstanding. This movie is of high quality as well, not your usual pornographic movie, since it deals with real people and their real emotions. However, I was more than a little disappointed since from the title and everything, I expected something about the couples. And I am sure most others do, as well. However, this is each person individually, starting with the interview and then going into a masturbation exercise. While this is fun the first time, it quickly becomes boring person after person. Certainly not a movie recommended for couples, because there is not much for couples.
